name: Bread Quest 1
description:
Bread Quest 1 demo

full game is in active development. Expected full release around October 2021

Full Game will include - 

*More Characters

*Full Campaign

*Multiplayer

*Better art

*pets

And lots more!

Stayed hyped! release could be delayed because this game is only made by one person. This is the extended version of the demo. It includes more to the Campaign.
